content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Ah, Miss Müller, it's a pleasure to meet you. I understand that you are interested in renting my apartment in Munich. As a landlord, I am always looking for the best possible rental price for my property. May I ask what your budget is for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I have a budget of 350 Euros per month. Thanks for your help.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for sharing your budget, Miss Müller. Based on the size of the apartment and the current market rates in Munich, I believe that we can come to an agreement on a rental price that works for both of us.

I would like to propose a rental price of 320 Euros per month. This price takes into consideration the size of the apartment, the location, and the current market rates in Munich. I believe that this price is fair and reasonable, and I am confident that it will meet your needs while also providing me with a reasonable return on my investment.

What are your thoughts on this proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you for your proposal, Mister Heine. However, I am not sure if I can accept this price. I was hoping for a lower price. Would it be possible to negotiate further?

I understand that you want to get the best possible rental price for your property, but I am trying to keep my rent as low as possible. I am a student, and I want to make sure that I can afford to live comfortably while also paying my bills.

If you are not willing to negotiate further, I would like to terminate this negotiation. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for your response, Miss Müller. I understand your concern for affordability, and I appreciate your honesty in expressing your needs.

While I am willing to negotiate further, I must explain that as a landlord, I have certain financial obligations that I must meet. I want to make sure that I am able to cover my costs and maintain a reasonable return on my investment.

That being said, I am willing to consider a rental price of 300 Euros per month. This price takes into account your budget and your concern for affordability, while still providing me with a reasonable return on my investment.

I hope that this proposal is acceptable to you. If not, I understand and we can terminate this negotiation. Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Heinrich Heine
